A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it! Getting away from the same old back story. Rian Johnson took a much needed sharp left turn. I absolutely love all the original characters. I would love to see them stay part of the story for a long time\, but only if the story wasn't so predictable every time. It was always too comfortable. This shakes things up a bit! Johnson does a great job with yoda and the reunion of R2 and luke. Every scene with our Princess was phenomenal and touching. Can't wait for the next one!
